text:
Room in disarray, tension high.  
He feels panic rising.  
Raskolnikov: "What if they search my room?"  

Raskolnikov: "Nothing here... no one has come."  

He rushes to the corner, breathless.  
Raskolnikov: "I left everything in the hole!"  

He pulls out items, stuffing pockets.  
Raskolnikov: "Two boxes, four cases... and a chain!"  

---
Outside, anxiety grips him.  
He glances over his shoulder.  
Raskolnikov: "I must hide all traces."  

Raskolnikov: "Where to go? The canal..."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov frantically searches his room for stolen items, fearing discovery and contemplating how to dispose of them.
